ResearchProjectDef.label: bronze working
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mix steel with stone chunks to create slightly weaker metal in large quantities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crafting bench
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a workbench for crafting simple things like clubs or bows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cement making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a cement press, which allows you to create extremely durable stone material out of stone chunks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wood-fired crematorium
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a huge, wood-fired stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with high temperatures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tyrian production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a tyrian farm - a river-bank structure that dyes cloth, which can then be extracted in the form of extremely valuable royal fabric.

ResearchProjectDef.label: road building
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct paths, dirt roads and stone roads directly on the world map, allowing for faster caravan travel.
